Contributor: Sperry, Edward P., artist.; Imperial Engraving Co., engraver, printer.;
Note: Signed "Edward P. Sperry." Date based on America's participation in the war. "367" appears on bottom left of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says American Duryea War Relief. Illustration shows three nurses standing on the outside steps of building greeting a women with her sick children.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
